text: 10.13 Lom 12.3 Chɨn pen, bɨlokɨl nɨŋɨd chɨn ke yɨb awl dad aplanon, yɨb chɨn dad yi alaŋ amnɨmuŋ agɨl ma nopun. God chɨnop bɨlok lek ke gɨpun ak nep agyɨkɨnɨgabun. God wog chɨnop aglɨl ñub tek, chɨn ke gos nɨŋɨd, chɨn ke bɨlokɨnɨgun agɨl gos nopun. Pen wog God chɨnop aglup ak, nɨbi Kolin binɨb anɨb sɨŋak mɨdebɨm.
